definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Glutaraldehyde can strengthen the conjugation of NCF with protein.
sentences.chinese: 用戊二醛處理硝酸纖維素膜可以增強蛋白吸附。

sentences.english: Aim To determine aftereffect in the degradation of cotton cellulose.
sentences.chinese: 研究棉纖維素的輻射降解的後效應。

sentences.english: The fiber and protein boost allows a small serving with great contentment.
sentences.chinese: 攝入一點點纖維素和蛋白質，就會得到大大的滿足。

sentences.english: A application of bioconversion of cellulose in production of feed and fertilizer was reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了纖維素生物轉化在農業飼料和肥料中的應用。

sentences.english: Huiquan Li, Jinshu Wang. Recycling and Reuse of Ionic Liquid in Homogeneous Cellulose Acetylation.
sentences.chinese: 蔗渣纖維素在離子液體中的溶解與再生。

sentences.english: Study on the use of acetic anhydride as a co reagent of fatty acid to synthesize cellulose esters.
sentences.chinese: 採用乙酸酐爲共反應劑合成了纖維素高級脂肪酸酯。

sentences.english: The quaternary ammonium salt and hydroxy ethyl cellulose were contained in a special organic chemical wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 某廠特種有機廢水，含季銨鹽和羥乙基纖維素。

sentences.english: Plant cell walls are made of cellulose fibers in a cementing matrix of other polysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 是由纖維素纖絲構成的網狀結構。

sentences.english: The title alkyd resin modified waterborne nitrocellulose emulsion was prepared by alkyd resin phase inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 採用醇酸樹脂相反轉乳化法制備了硝化纖維素乳液。

sentences.english: Made from cellulose, this shrink-wrap decomposes in a few weeks in a compost rubbish or in an industrial composter .
sentences.chinese: 由纖維素，這拆封分解在數週或垃圾堆肥在工業堆肥。

sentences.english: The hydrolysis of cellulose is a homogeneous phase reaction in acid-peeling finishing.
sentences.chinese: 酸減量整理中，纖維素的水解是一個均相水解反應。

sentences.english: Temporarily cut back on high-fiber foods.
sentences.chinese: 暫時減少食用高纖維素食物。

sentences.english: Cellulase was applied to pretreat cotton yarn-dyed fabric in super soft finish.
sentences.chinese: 採用纖維素酶在純棉色織物柔軟整理前進行預處理。

sentences.english: The inoculated medium is then aerobically incubated to facilitate the production of cellulose.
sentences.chinese: 在接種中，然後有氧培養，促進纖維素生產。

sentences.english: It was not good for protoplast isolation at too high or low concentration of cellulase.
sentences.chinese: 纖維素酶濃度過高或過低均使產量和活力降低。

sentences.english: Most people don’t have enough fiber in their diet.
sentences.chinese: 多數人的飲食中含纖維素不足。
